input.sentences: there is traffic due to the big race today !
people stop by the side of the road | ready to watch the upcoming runners .
the runners make their way down the road .
another round of runners are coming down now !
output.sentences: I wake up every morning walking to work.
My job is to make sure to direct traffic.
On my way to work I see people waking up early for a jogging.
The road almost have no pedestrians.
And finally I made it to work getting ready for the day.
